com.google.gwt.language.client.translation
Class Translation

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.language.client.translation.Translation

public class Translation
extends java.lang.Object

Wrappers for all translation API.

Method Detail

createBrandingWidget

public static com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget createBrandingWidget(BrandingOptions options)
Creates a widget with Google branding.

Returns:
branding widget

detect

public static void detect(java.lang.String text,
                          LangDetCallback callback)
A global method that will return the language code that describes the language of the given text. The result is supplied asynchronously to the given callback function as the result object.

Parameters:
text - text whose language has to be detected
callback - callback for asynchronous feedback

getBranding

public static void getBranding(java.lang.String id,
                               BrandingOptions options)
Gets Google branding DOM and attaches it to the div specified by id. Note that for this to work, the div given by id should already be attached to RootPanel before this method is invoked.

Parameters:
id - the id to which branding DOM should be attached
options - options for branding

getBranding

public static com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element getBranding(BrandingOptions options)
Returns Google brand images as a HTML Element object.

Returns:
the element containing branding DOM

isFontRenderingSupported

public static FontRenderingStatus isFontRenderingSupported(Language lang)
Method that will detect whether Unicode font rendering for the indicated language is supported on the user's browser or not. The result is a constant from the Font Rendering Status Enum.

Parameters:
lang - the language whose font rendering support status is expected
Returns:
font rendering status

isTranslatable

public static boolean isTranslatable(Language lang)
A method that will return the translatable status for a given language code.

Parameters:
lang - the language from Language enum.
Returns:
true if language is translatable.

translate

public static void translate(Option option,
                             Language src,
                             Language dest,
                             TranslationCallback callback)
Method that will return translated text for the given text supplied, matching the destination language. The result is supplied asynchronously to the given callback as the result object.

Parameters:
option - the Option object.
src - source language
dest - destination language
callback - callback for asynchronous feedback

translate

public static void translate(java.lang.String text,
                             Language src,
                             Language dest,
                             TranslationCallback callback)
Method that will return translated text for the given text supplied, matching the destination language. The result is supplied asynchronously to the given callback as the result object.

Parameters:
text - text to be translated
src - source language
dest - destination language
callback - callback for asynchronous feedback

translate

public static void translate(java.lang.String text,
                             java.lang.String src,
                             java.lang.String dest,
                             TranslationCallback callback)
Translates text from source to destination language.

Parameters:
text - text to be translated
src - source language
dest - destination language
callback - callback for asynchronous feedback
